title: Women live globally longer, healthier lives with better education, reveals new UN report (ECLAC - ...
text: ( Source : ECLAC - Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean ) ( New York , 20 October ) The lives of women and girls around the world have improved in several areas over the last 20 years, according to the new United Nations report
